typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		{Credit Given} as string,
		Gender as string,
		Education as string,
		{Marital Status} as string,
		Age as string,
		{Pay Stat M1} as string,
		{Bill Amt M1} as string,
		{Amt Paid M1} as string,
		{Pay Stat M2} as string,
		{Bill Amt M2} as string,
		{Amt Paid M2} as string,
		{Pay Stat M3} as string,
		{Bill Amt M3} as string,
		{Amt Paid M3} as string,
		{Default Next Month} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 rank(asc({Credit Given}, true),
	output({Credit Given} as long)) ~> Rank1
Rank1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
